channel.title: aworks tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from aworks.

item.description: United UA 1848 aborted takeoff in Orlando. Rolling down the runway when they applied the brakes. Pilot came on later to say a cockpit window was open at 120 mph so they rejected the takeoff. Taxied to the gate for a brake and tire check and to fix the window lock problem.
item.source:markdown: United UA 1848 aborted takeoff in Orlando. Rolling down the runway when they applied the brakes. Pilot came on later to say a cockpit window was open at 120 mph so they rejected the takeoff. Taxied to the gate for a brake and tire check and to fix the window lock problem.

item.description: "this piece of music is a place that you can go to, a kind of astral sanctum that can be visited again and again so long as you know the mysterious paths that lead to it." https://t.co/Y9KFnxdinG
